extension-ocean.name: extension-ocean
extension-ocean.description: Ocean API Extensio module and convenience Classes

Class.name: Class
Class.description: Base Class object that takes care of inheritence

html.name: html

BrowserKlass.name: BrowserKlass
BrowserKlass.description:
Handles detection of Browser
Will be instantiated into global namespace as Browser by the framework

Array.name: Array
Array.description: Base JavaScript Array class used for extending with convenience functions

hash.name: hash
hash.description: Convenience function used for setting a unique hash id on DOM nodes with memory pointer to Widgets

gdispathEvent.name: gdispathEvent
gdispathEvent.description: Convenience function used to dispatch events to Widgets

DOM.name: DOM
DOM.description:
LowLevel DOM abastraction used by the framework as an interface for operations
Should not be used when building apps, then use the html function instead

classitems.description: Does the inheritance and makes sure ._super() fires on the right step
classitems.name: extend

classitems.description: The name of the current browser
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The version of the current browser
classitems.name: version

classitems.description: Detects what Browser and version it is
classitems.name: detect

return.description: Object returned has properties: browser: "name", version: "number"

classitems.description: Removes a object in the Array on arbitrary position
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: Returns the index position of the object in Array
classitems.name: index

classitems.description: Inserts Object at position i in the Array
classitems.name: insert

params.name: i
params.description: Index position to insert Object at

params.name: obj
params.description: Object to insert at index i

classitems.description: Align left styling value
classitems.name: ALIGN_LEFT

classitems.description: Align center styling value
classitems.name: ALIGN_CENTER

classitems.description: Align right styling value
classitems.name: ALIGN_RIGHT

classitems.description: Align top styling value
classitems.name: ALIGN_TOP

classitems.description: Align middle styling value
classitems.name: ALIGN_MIDDLE

classitems.description: Align bottom styling value
classitems.name: ALIGN_BOTTOM

classitems.description: Modifer integer value for ALT key
classitems.name: MODIFIER_ALT

classitems.description: Modifer integer value for CTRL key
classitems.name: MODIFIER_CTRL

classitems.description: Modifer integer value for SHIFT key
classitems.name: MODIFIER_SHIFT

classitems.description: Inserts Object at position i in the Array
classitems.name: dispatchEvent

params.name: event
params.description: Event to be fired

params.name: element
params.description: DOM Element object currently not used

params.name: listener
params.description: Widget object that implemented onBrowserEvent(event) method

classitems.description: Returns an arbitrary DOM node
classitems.name: createElement

params.name: tag
params.description: DOM Element name

classitems.description: Returns a Text DOM node and inserts text
classitems.name: createText

params.name: text
params.description: Text to be inserted in DOM node

classitems.description: Returns a Text Area DOM node
classitems.name: createTextArea

classitems.description: Returns a DIV DOM node
classitems.name: createDiv

classitems.description: Returns a SPAN DOM node
classitems.name: createSpan

classitems.description: Returns a A DOM node
classitems.name: createAnchor

classitems.description: Returns a BUTTON DOM node
classitems.name: createButton

classitems.description: Returns a FORM DOM node
classitems.name: createForm

classitems.description: Returns a IMG DOM node
classitems.name: createImage

classitems.description: Returns a IMG DOM node
classitems.name: createImg

classitems.description: Returns a TABLE DOM node
classitems.name: createTable

classitems.description: Returns a TR DOM node
classitems.name: createTR

classitems.description: Returns a TD DOM node
classitems.name: createTD

classitems.description: Returns a TBODY DOM node
classitems.name: createTBody

classitems.description: Returns a LABEL DOM node
classitems.name: createLabel

classitems.description: Returns a SELECT DOM node
classitems.name: createSelect

classitems.description: Returns a H1 DOM node
classitems.name: createH1

classitems.description: Returns a H2 DOM node
classitems.name: createH2

classitems.description: Returns a H3 DOM node
classitems.name: createH3

classitems.description: Returns a INPUT DOM node of type radio with gname as group
classitems.name: createInputRadio

params.name: group
params.description: Group object the radio button should belong to

classitems.description: Returns a INPUT DOM node
classitems.name: createInputElement

params.name: type
params.description: Value to be set as element.type if not IE

classitems.description: Returns a INPUT DOM node with type as checkbox
classitems.name: createInputCheck

classitems.description: Returns a INPUT DOM node with type as password
classitems.name: createInputPassword

classitems.description: Returns a IFRAME DOM node
classitems.name: createIFrame

classitems.description: Sets a attribute value on a element
classitems.name: setAttribute

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set attribtue on

params.name: attribute
params.description: Attribute name to set on element

params.name: value
params.description: The actual attribute value to set

classitems.description: Return the attribute value on a element
classitems.name: getAttribute

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to retrieve attribute from

params.name: attribute
params.description: Name of the attribute to recieve value from

return.description: String value for the attribute on element

classitems.description: Set CSS style on element
classitems.name: setStyleAttribute

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set styling on

params.name: attribute
params.description: Styling attribute name

params.name: value
params.description: Value of the styling attribute

classitems.description: Get CSS style on element
classitems.name: getStyleAttribute

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to retrieve styling value from

params.name: attribute
params.description: Styling name to retrieve value for

return.description: Value of the styling attribute on element

classitems.description: Remove a child element from parent element
classitems.name: removeChild

params.name: parent
params.description: Parent DOM element

params.name: child
params.description: Child DOM element to remove from parent element

classitems.description: Inserts a DOM element as a child element to parent element at index/sibling position
classitems.name: insertChild

params.name: parent
params.description: Parent DOM element

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to insert as child to parent element

params.name: index
params.description: Sibling position to insert element unto parent element at

classitems.description: Appends a DOM element unto a parent element as last sibling in the order
classitems.name: appendChild

params.name: parent
params.description: Parent DOM element

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to insert as last sibling unto parent element

classitems.description: Return child element on a element with specific sibling index
classitems.name: getChild

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to look for the child at index on

params.name: index
params.description: Childs sibling position

return.description: Child element at index position if found, else null

classitems.description: Returns next sibling element for a element
classitems.name: getNextSibling

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to look for next sibling

return.description: Sibling element if found, else null

classitems.description: Return first child element on a element
classitems.name: getFirstChild

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to look for a first child element on

return.description: First child element if found, else null if no child elements exist

classitems.description: Returns number of child elements on a element
classitems.name: getChildCount

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to count number of children on

classitems.description: Return element by id
classitems.name: getElementById

params.name: id
params.description: DOM elements id name

return.description: Return element if found in DOM tree, else null

classitems.description: Return parent of DOM element
classitems.name: getParent

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to retrieve parent of

return.description: Parent DOM element if found, else null

classitems.description: Inserts and creates a list item with value at index poisition in list
classitems.name: insertListItem

params.name: select
params.description: List DOM element to insert item into

params.name: item
params.description: Name of list item

params.name: value
params.description: Value for list item

params.name: index
params.description: Position to insert list item into the list at

classitems.description: Prevent default propagation of event
classitems.name: eventPreventDefault

params.name: event
params.description: Event to stop default propagation on

classitems.description:
Sinks event on DOM element using a bits code defined by framework for each event
Created properties corresponding to each event on the DOM element for further use by framework
classitems.name: sinkEvents

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to sink event to

params.name: bits
params.description: Bits code corresponding to the event

classitems.description: Set event listener on DOM element used by framework to handle events for widgets
classitems.name: setEventListener

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set custom event listener to

params.name: listener
params.description: Listener callback function for the event listener

classitems.description: Return event type of a event object
classitems.name: eventGetType

params.name: event
params.description: Event object to retrieve type of

classitems.description: Set attribute on element with value
classitems.name: setIntStyleAttribute

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set the attribute on

params.name: attribute
params.description: Name of the attribute to set

params.name: value
params.description: Value to set for the attribute on DOM node

classitems.description: Sets inner HTML on a DOM element
classitems.name: setInnerHTML

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set the inner HTML unto

params.name: html
params.description: String of parsable HTML code

classitems.description: Return the inner HTML code of a DOM element
classitems.name: getInnerHTML

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to return inner HTML from

classitems.description: Sets inner Text on a DOM element. Will remove first child if found and replace with a Text Node
classitems.name: setInnerText

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set the inner Text unto

params.name: text
params.description: Text to append

classitems.description: Returns the inner Text of a DOM element. Loops thru children and returns all Inner Text of all children
classitems.name: getInnerText

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to get inner text from

return.description: All text found on all child elements appended together

classitems.description: Returns clientX from an Event
classitems.name: eventGetClientX

params.name: event
params.description: Event to get the value from

classitems.description: Returns clientY from an Event
classitems.name: eventGetClientY

params.name: event
params.description: Event to get the value from

classitems.description: Returns absolute left position value for a DOM element. Sums all parent DOM nodes offset adding the bodys scrollLeft.
classitems.name: getAbsoluteLeft

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to measure absolute left value for

classitems.description: Returns absolute top position value for a DOM element. Sums all parent DOM nodes offset adding the bodys scrollTop.
classitems.name: getAbsoluteTop

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to measure absolute top value for

classitems.description: Compare two DOM elements, returns true if equal else false
classitems.name: compare

params.name: element1
params.description: First DOM element to compare

params.name: element2
params.description: Second DOM element to compare

return.description: True if equal (same elements) else false

classitems.description: Sets class name value on a DOM element. For several class names use space as delimiter in the style attribute value
classitems.name: setStyleName

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set class name on

params.name: style
params.description: String value to set as class name

classitems.description: Return class name value on a DOM element
classitems.name: getStyleName

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to return the class name value from

return.description: String value on DOM elements class name

classitems.description: Removes a class name from the DOM elements current class names
classitems.name: removeStyleName

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to remove a class name from

params.name: style
params.description: Class name to remove from DOM element

classitems.description: Adds a class name to the current list of class names on DOM element
classitems.name: addStyleName

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to add the class name to

params.name: style
params.description: String value of the class name to add to DOM element

classitems.description: Returns a array of class names of the DOM element. Requires the class name string value to be set with space as delimiter
classitems.name: getStyleNames

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to retrieve the class names on

return.description: Array with all class names on DOM element

classitems.description: Fire Blur event on DOM element
classitems.name: blur

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to fire blur event on

classitems.description: Returns a created DIV element that is set as focused on
classitems.name: createFocusable

return.description: DIV element that is set as focused

classitems.description: Fire Focus event on DOM element
classitems.name: focus

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to fire focus event on

classitems.description: Returns the tab index on a DOM element
classitems.name: getTabIndex

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to retrieve tab index from

classitems.description:
Sets a shortcut access key on a DOM element. This varies for browsers what the actual shortcut will be.
See this list for accessing the shortcut access key: http://www.w3schools.com/jsref/prop_html_accesskey.asp
classitems.name: setAccessKey

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set access key on

params.name: key
params.description: The actual letter character to set as access key

classitems.description: Sets tab index on a DOM element
classitems.name: setTabIndex

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element to set tab index

params.name: index
params.description: Tab index value

classitems.description: Returns 1 if one or more keyboard modifiers were used on Event else 0
classitems.name: getKeyboardModifiers

params.name: event
params.description: Event to check keyboard modifier on

classitems.description: Sets if a Event should cancel bubbling or not
classitems.name: eventCancelBubble

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to set cancel bubble on

params.name: cancel
params.description: True to cancel bubbling else false to permit bubbling of event

classitems.description: Returns if Alt key were used on Event
classitems.name: eventGetAltKey

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check if Alt key were used on

return.description: 1 if Alt key were used else 0

classitems.description: Returns what mouse button were used on Event
classitems.name: eventGetButton

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check if any mouse button were used on

return.description: 0 = left; 1 = middle; 2 = right - mouse button. For IE8 and earlier: 1 = left; 4 = middle; 2 = right - mouse button

classitems.description: Returns if Ctrl key were used on Event
classitems.name: eventGetCtrlKey

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check if Ctrl key were used on

return.description: 1 if Ctrl key were used else 0

classitems.description: Returns the From Element on a onactivate, onfocus, onmouseenter, onmouseleave, onmouseout or onmouseover Event
classitems.name: eventGetFromElement

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check if from element exist

return.description: From element if it exist else null

classitems.description: Returns which keyboard key or mouse button was pressed on Event, either which or keyCode attribute on Event
classitems.name: eventGetKeyCode

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to find which key was used on

return.description: Numeric key code if which attribute exist eler unicode value of key pressed

classitems.description: Checks if any key is repeatedly held
classitems.name: eventGetRepeat

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check

return.description: True if any key i srepeatedly held for Event else false

classitems.description: Returns the horizontal screen coordinate of the mouse for Event
classitems.name: eventGetScreenX

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check

return.description: The horizontal coordinate of mouse pointer

classitems.description: Returns the vertical screen coordinate of the mouse for Event
classitems.name: eventGetScreenY

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check

return.description: The vertical coordinate of mouse pointer

classitems.description: Returns if Shift key were used on Event
classitems.name: eventGetShiftKey

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check if Shift key were used on

return.description: 1 if Shift key were used else 0

classitems.description: Returns target element of Event if any
classitems.name: eventGetTarget

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check

return.description: Target element if any else source element

classitems.description: Returns related target element if any, used together with mouseover and mouseout events
classitems.name: eventGetToElement

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to check

classitems.description: Returns the type of an Event
classitems.name: eventGetType

params.name: event
params.description: Event to determine typ of

classitems.description:
Returns framework code for a Events type. All codes are defined in the global object Event in framework.
All this is done because the framework has its own handling of Event to take better control and make it easier
to stop propagation and let events bubble in widgets.
classitems.name: eventGetTypeInt

params.name: event
params.description: Event to determine framework type code for

return.description: Code corresponding to Events type in framework

classitems.description: Returns an Events type. Same as eventGetType. Separated for future needs
classitems.name: eventGetType

params.name: event
params.description: Event to check type of

classitems.description: Sets key code on a Event
classitems.name: eventSetKeyCode

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to set key code on

params.name: key
params.description: Code to set as key code on Event

classitems.description: Returns Event as a string
classitems.name: eventToString

params.name: evt
params.description: Event to stringify

classitems.description: Returns source of a iframe Element. Does not currently check that Element is a iframe
classitems.name: iframeGetSrc

params.name: elem
params.description: Element assumed to be an iframe

classitems.description: Returns an Array of current x-y page scroll values
classitems.name: getPageScroll

classitems.description: Returns current window height value
classitems.name: getPageHeight

classitems.description: Returns current window height
classitems.name: getClientHeight

classitems.description: Returns current window width
classitems.name: getClientWidth
